input.sentences: the landscaping around the apartments were well taken care of .
the apartments were close in proximity .
this was one of the older apartments on the block .
the corner lots offered plenty of shade .

output.sentences: There was some landscaping done at some apartments.
It was extremely close to my apartment.
The many apartments on our block are all run down and are in need of some landscaping.
There is plenty of shade offered by the buildings and trees around our block.
These buildings are quite unique when compared to the ones close by.
